reviewText: An implausible story with little attention given to common sense, this is still very entertaining as the students bobble and struggle to find their place in the world.  Some versions of the story are not legit, some versions are licensed, but in any case avoid the earlier English dubbed versions and go with the subtitled copies.

This is unauthorized package! Because you can see the "AT-X" logos on start of A-Part and B-Part , It's "Anime Theater X" as Japanese CATV channel's!
all Images low bits rate so wrong. Do not buy It!
